This package will install imod_4.10.32_osx64_10.8_CUDA4.1

IMOD will be installed in /Applications/IMOD

Ignore the option to Change Install Location.

If the installation fails, a log of the output will be left in a file named IMOD-install.log in your home directory.

----------------------------------------------------------------

IMOD is a suite of image processing, modeling and display programs used for tomographic reconstruction and for 3D reconstruction of EM serial sections and optical sections.
For more information see http://bio3d.colorado.edu/imod
